alert.note: Alert for Northwest Providence (Rhode Island) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 2:43PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Windham, southeastern Worcester, west central Norfolk and northwestern Providence Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 242 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Southbridge, or 17 miles southwest of Worcester, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Woonsocket, Milford, Webster, Southbridge, Bellingham, Burrillville, Northbridge, Oxford, Uxbridge, Charlton, North Smithfield, Dudley, Thompson, Sturbridge, Blackstone, Sutton, Douglas, Woodstock, Upton, and Hopedale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
